Old Capitol

The sweeping staircases and stately elegance of the historic Old Capitol is the ideal backdrop for a picture-perfect wedding. Located in the heart of Iowa City, the building served as the state of Iowa's first capitol from 1846 to 1857 and became a National Historic Landmark in 1976. The Old Capitol's dome is the University of Iowa's logo and remains one of the most recognizable images and landmarks in the state of Iowa.

The Senate Chamber is the perfect location for an sophisticated ceremony. Smaller groups might enjoy the Supreme Court Chamber or even the grand staircase for their wedding ceremony.

Features & Location

Capacity: 100
Venue is indoors
Air conditioning available

Best for:

Ceremonies, Cocktail Hours
